|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[[SerComm WD300]] (''Wind Home&Life HUB'') • [https://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showpost.php?p=45118181&postcount=1 HWU] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM63136V 2x @1GHz (ARM Cortex-A9) :2.4GHz: [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 (A3KMLG) 3T3R 802.11bgn :5GHz: [[Broadcom]] BCM4366E (KMMLW1G) 4T4R 802.11an/ac :1x DSL, 1x WAN (GbE), 4x LAN (GbE), 2x FXS, 1x USB 3.0, 1x SFP :Wi-Fi Cert: WFA79646 (October 12, 2018) {{See also|SerComm VD625|SerComm}} ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showthread.php?t=2878681 ''Sercomm WD300'' on '''HWUpgrade''' forums] (IT) ==Notes== :;sysinfo
